channel.title: Npc/shops
channel.description: ok so i made a pk points thing in my server and i made a pk points shop but now i cant find the npc who sells it i did the [code]WanneShop = 1;[/code] but it gave me varrock general store guy and i spawned him and he wasnt selling the right stuff what do i do? help please =]

item.title: Npc/shops
item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

the id of the shop is 1
and i have done that it gives me the varrock general guy

Read full topic

item.title: Npc/shops
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Find the id of the shop, and search for it in the packet.

Read full topic
